subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Fred Couples, whose back is so creaky that he no longer practices, made a putt of nearly 100 feet for an opening birdie on his way to a two-stroke lead at the Northern Trust Open.
snippet: Fred Couples, whose back is so creaky that he no longer practices, made a putt of nearly 100 feet for an opening birdie on his way to a two-stroke lead at the Northern Trust Open.
